total balance of currency aTokens","returns":{"_0":"Balance of aTokens in this contract"}},"aTokenValue()":{"details":"Value of aTokens in the pool Will return sync value if inSync","returns":{"_0":"aTokenValue in underlying currency (principal + interest)."}},"allowance(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC20-allowance}."},"approvalRateThresholdReached(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Minimum ratio of yes to no","params":{"no":"number of reject votes","yes":"number of approval votes"},"returns":{"_0":"Whether a loan has reached minimum yes to no ratio"}},"approve(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC20-approve}. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address."},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"See {IERC20-balanceOf}."},"changeJoiningPauseStatus(bool)":{"details":"Allow pausing of deposits in case of emergency","params":{"status":"New deposit status"}},"currencyToken()":{"details":"get currency token","returns":{"_0":"currency token"}},"decimals()":{"details":"Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5,05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the value {ERC20} uses, unless {_setupDecimals} is called. NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}."},"decreaseAllowance(address,uint256)":{"details":"Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`."},"exit(uint256)":{"details":"Exit pool This function will withdraw the existing tokens backing the pool value","params":{"amount":"amount of pool tokens to redeem for underlying tokens"}},"flush(uint256)":{"details":"Deposit idle funds into moola pool and earn interest Called by owner to help manage funds in pool and save on gas for deposits","params":{"currencyAmount":"Amount of funds to deposit into curve"}},"fund(address)":{"details":"Fund a loan which meets the pool parameters","params":{"loanToken":"LoanToken to fund"}},"getAToken()":{"details":"Get the aToken from the moola address provider","returns":{"_0":"AToken for the stablecoin pool"}},"increaseAllowance(address,uint256)":{"details":"Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address."},"join(uint256)":{"details":"Join the pool by depositing stablecoin token","params":{"amount":"amount of stablecoin token to deposit"}},"liquidValue()":{"details":"Value of liquid assets in the pool","returns":{"_0":"Liquid value of pool assets"}},"loanValue(address)":{"details":"Value calculation for the loans taken by the pool","params":{"loan":"Loan to calculate value for"},"returns":{"_0":"value of a given loan"}},"name()":{"details":"Returns the name of the token."},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"participationRateThresholdReached(uint256)":{"details":"Minimum participation rate from the community managers","params":{"participation":"ration of managers participating in the voting"},"returns":{"_0":"Whether the loan reached the minimum participation rate"}},"poolValue()":{"details":"Calculate pool value in the stablecoin \"virtual price\" of entire pool - LoanTokens, stablecoin and aTOkens","returns":{"_0":"pool value in the stablecoin"}},"pull(uint256)":{"details":"Remove liquidity from moola markets","params":{"aAmount":"amount of  aTokens"}},"reclaim(address)":{"details":"For settled loans, redeem LoanTokens for underlying funds","params":{"loanToken":"Loan to reclaim capital from (must be previously funded)"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setCommunity(address)":{"details":"Set new community. Only owner can change parameters.","params":{"newCommunity":"New community."}},"setFundsManager(address)":{"details":"set funds manager address","params":{"newFundsManager":"New funds manager."}},"setParticipationSize(uint256)":{"details":"Set new participation size. Only owner can change parameters.","params":{"newParticipationSize":"New participation size."}},"symbol()":{"details":"Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name."},"totalLoansValue()":{"details":"Loop through loan tokens and calculate theoretical value of all loans There should never be too many loans in the pool to run out of gas","returns":{"_0":"Theoretical value of all the loans funded by this strategy"}},"totalSupply()":{"details":"See {IERC20-totalSupply}."},"transfer(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `amount`."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. This is not required by the EIP. See the note at the beginning of {ERC20}. Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`. - the caller must have allowance for ``sender``'s tokens of at least `amount`."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"votesThresholdReached(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Minimum absolute value of yes votes, rather than ratio of yes to no","params":{"amount":"Size of loan","yesVotes":"Number of yes votes"},"returns":{"_0":"Whether a loan has reached the required voting threshold"}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/home/bob/loaner-celo/smart-contracts/contracts/lending/LoanerPool.sol":"LoanerPool"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/home/bob/loaner-celo/smart-contracts/contracts/interfaces/IAToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa960e1773e475ffd8643a9980945ca077e934a87fe0a073f914167cf0b3851f7","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://07a81dad4aabffe6dfe057c43afb3357764834ef95ca748b92a4b4a01b8ebe0d","dweb:/ipfs/QmUNP1SvkKvz1W9Mt3PuxmMNYC2kctc3mWwZSVXtsEeoiM"]},"/home/bob/loaner-celo/smart-contracts/contracts/interfaces/ICommunity.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdedb0a0cda6c2d545b21f3ad09520db89a7b99561b836c8d7094b7be5f0a11b9","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://b607e316253b2f9b1b3a6e58f6d5cbca0e06743f26918fcba1033a1009f59067","dweb:/ipfs/QmWXkF3Eu9o35dp2MHiYoapZ43m6EE6jooBtfcFvjXTvY8"]},"/home/bob/loaner-celo/smart-contracts/contracts/interfaces/ILendingPool.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe7c73e064d1a0643a2e52b4855745beec7c40c1b784df41a5ad9491f6d5eb2d0","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://7aa2986b1e4aa4924faec4c43590188148f7514d6b11e4988703851fdff506b7","dweb:/ipfs/QmZjEXtgM3D8wfxbreLV7sqoT3VUggz9a3bUyrBMq4bMYK"]},"/home/bob/loaner-celo/smart-contracts/contracts/interfaces/ILendingPoolAddressesProvider.sol":{"keccak256":"0x4d13f719a000148d2a924c08aedf0f31f0b010ceb491bf1a0775416a3f72fdb9","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://4b8e190a4e287aac585100a1c2b2e6b8b17806a63d4e4ec8474431bfc309e6b4","dweb:/ipfs/QmdkL2GS8eZ9fha7E3UGVjtNyz7kyaGicEqFmnv6izFhdC"]},"/home/bob/loaner-celo/smart-contracts/contracts/interfaces/ILoanToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9d1e9fd47a5a7d6a29e62b683dac6f415d3f4b348e3756739f5ab740eefb8b98","license":"Apache-2.0","urls":["bzz-raw://5e0834ea7cadf89336b89e3a69d91f48f430d76ed1285ccb6b646c243c271816","dweb:/ipfs/QmNnXLrssBcs6swBsTpiikTBrfsNak6MTB3yqx6DYU4KUN"]},"/home/bob/loaner-celo/smart-contracts/ documentation.text: @dev only loaner contract can set fund manager and pool parameters

Sync values to avoid making expensive calls multiple times
 Will set inSync to true, allowing getter functions to return cached values
 Wipes cached values to save gas

arguments.value: Loaner LP
MKO-LP

attributes.text:
@dev Remove liquidity from moola markets
 @param aAmount amount of  aTokens

@dev Get the aToken from the moola address provider
 @return AToken for the stablecoin pool

@dev Value of liquid assets in the pool
 @return Liquid value of pool assets

@dev Currency token balance
 @return Currency token balance

@dev Get total balance of currency aTokens
 @return Balance of aTokens in this contract

@param depositedAmount Amount of stablecoin deposited
 @return amount minted from this transaction

aTokenBalance().details: Get total balance of currency aTokens

returns._0: Balance of aTokens in this contract

aTokenValue().details: Value of aTokens in the pool Will return sync value if inSync

approvalRateThresholdReached(uint256,uin.details: Minimum ratio of yes to no

returns._0: Whether a loan has reached minimum yes to no ratio

approve(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-approve}. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

changeJoiningPauseStatus(bool).details: Allow pausing of deposits in case of emergency

decimals().details: Returns the number of decimals used to get its user representation. For example, if `decimals` equals `2`, a balance of `505` tokens should be displayed to a user as `5,05` (`505 / 10 ** 2`). Tokens usually opt for a value of 18, imitating the relationship between Ether and Wei. This is the value {ERC20} uses, unless {_setupDecimals} is called. NOTE: This information is only used for _display_ purposes: it in no way affects any of the arithmetic of the contract, including {IERC20-balanceOf} and {IERC20-transfer}.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`.

exit(uint256).details: Exit pool This function will withdraw the existing tokens backing the pool value

params.amount: amount of pool tokens to redeem for underlying tokens

flush(uint256).details: Deposit idle funds into moola pool and earn interest Called by owner to help manage funds in pool and save on gas for deposits

params.currencyAmount: Amount of funds to deposit into curve

fund(address).details: Fund a loan which meets the pool parameters

getAToken().details: Get the aToken from the moola address provider

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

join(uint256).details: Join the pool by depositing stablecoin token

params.amount: amount of stablecoin token to deposit

liquidValue().details: Value of liquid assets in the pool

loanValue(address).details: Value calculation for the loans taken by the pool

name().details: Returns the name of the token.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

participationRateThresholdReached(uint25.details: Minimum participation rate from the community managers

params.participation: ration of managers participating in the voting

returns._0: Whether the loan reached the minimum participation rate

poolValue().details: Calculate pool value in the stablecoin "virtual price" of entire pool - LoanTokens, stablecoin and aTOkens

reclaim(address).details: For settled loans, redeem LoanTokens for underlying funds

params.loanToken: Loan to reclaim capital from (must be previously funded)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setCommunity(address).details: Set new community. Only owner can change parameters.

setParticipationSize(uint256).details: Set new participation size. Only owner can change parameters.

symbol().details: Returns the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.

totalLoansValue().details: Loop through loan tokens and calculate theoretical value of all loans There should never be too many loans in the pool to run out of gas

returns._0: Theoretical value of all the loans funded by this strategy

transfer(address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transfer}. Requirements: - `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - the caller must have a balance of at least `amount`.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: See {IERC20-transferFrom}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. This is not required by the EIP. See the note at the beginning of {ERC20}. Requirements: - `sender` and `recipient` cannot be the zero address. - `sender` must have a balance of at least `amount`. - the caller must have allowance for ``sender``'s tokens of at least `amount`.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

votesThresholdReached(uint256,uint256).details: Minimum absolute value of yes votes, rather than ratio of yes to no

returns._0: Whether a loan has reached the required voting threshold
